query.statement: SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, USE_YN, REG_ID FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = :vo.categoryNo
SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY_NO
SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY category.CATEGORY_NO DESC
INSERT INTO CATEGORY ( CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES (:vo.categoryNo, :vo.categoryName, :vo.categoryDesc, :vo.useYn, 'test', sysdate)
UPDATE CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_NAME = :vo.categoryName, CATEGORY_DESC = :vo.categoryDesc, USE_YN = :vo.useYn, MODIFY_ID = 'test', MODIFY_DATE = sysdate WHERE CATEGORY_NO = :vo.categoryNo
